item.title: Please guys, i really need help =[!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Okay, yesterday, i was adding the SpellID’s for Zammy flames, sara strike, and guthix… E.G

} else if(spellID == 1192) { //flames of zammy
if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2417) {
if(charge >= 1) {
hitDiff = misc.random(30);
} else {
hitDiff = misc.random(20);
}
castOnPlayer.zammyTimer = 6;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 3;
startAnimation(811);
} else {
sendMesage(“You need a magic level of 60 and a zammy staff to cast this spell”);
startAnimation(0);
}
Then it goes onto smoke barrage liek…
if(spellID == 12975) //smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 95)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 5)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 14)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 15)==false))

^^^ etc… but since i added the int’s and what ever for the god spells, my ancients haven’t been working at all…just like a wind strike … and hits a 0…

before i added the god spells, it was working perfectly… anyone got any idea why this is happening?

id really apreciate it if someone would help me

Read full topic
